item.title: How I Learned to Code
item.description: Dan Luu has this great post about how he learned to program. I liked this quote from that post: I like this idea because I’ve found that the paths that people take to get into programming are much more varied than stereotypes give credit for, and I think it’s useful to see that there are many possible paths into programming. There are indeed a bunch of ways that people can get into coding.

item.title: PM Types
